mapper.sql: id, devimage, devid, name, type, parameters, vendor, guranteeFrom, owner
mapper.select: select d.id id, d.devimage devimage, d.devid devid, d.name name, d.type type, d.parameters parameters, d.vendor vendor, d.guranteeFrom guranteeFrom, d.owner owner from device d, group_device_mapping gdm where d.id = gdm.deviceId and gdm.groupId = #{groupId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into device
id,
devimage,
devid,
name,
type,
parameters,
vendor,
guranteeFrom,
owner,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{devimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{guranteeFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update device
devimage = #{devimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
devid = #{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parameters = #{parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendor = #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guranteeFrom = #{guranteeFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update device set devimage = #{devimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, devid = #{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameters = #{parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vendor = #{vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guranteeFrom = #{guranteeFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
